text: [Music]
[Applause]
job interview skills a program to master
the difficult stages and situations in a
job interview job interview skills
introduction and definitions what is an
interview an interview is a screening
process in which you are given an
opportunity to learn more about the
prospect that is your organization while
the organization also has the
opportunity to evaluate you as a
prospective employer but personal
interview is an important step in the
process of selection of a candidate for
a job or for an admission to a business
school the interview process provides
you with a face-to-face opportunity to
set yourself apart from your competition
and expand on the information the
employer already knows about you from
your resume as a well-prepared candidate
you can use the interview process to
send the message that I'm the best
person for the job to everything you say
and do the interview is a critical step
towards the goal of employment or
admission it is of the interview that
the job is often won or lost the best
test of any job search is the number of
interviews you are offered if you're
constantly approached for interviews you
should expect job offers if you're not
getting interviews you need to really
evaluate your job search strategy if you
have been called for an interview you
can assume that the organization is
interested in you and that the employer
has a need that you may be able to meet
interviews can be stressful but when you
are well prepared there is no reason to
panic an interview generally lasts from
30 to 60 minutes and most questions fall
into standard categories the good news
is that interviews are often highly
predictable and you can do a great deal
of advanced preparation that can
potentially minimize your chances of
elimination but they can also be tricky
and unpredictable if you are
underprepared or overconfident
interviews are all about trying to
identify patterns of behavior in the
candidate that will carry through from
the selection process into their working
life this was a demonstration of video
for job interview skills for complete
program visit us at let's talk company
dot in if you liked this video kindly
share your comments which will encourage
just to make more videos for you you can
also subscribe to our youtube channel by
clicking subscribe button just above
this video thank you for watching us
take care
[Music]
